basics.name: Juan Pablo Addeo
basics.label: Software Engineer and Full Stack Developer focused on building products that solve real problems
basics.summary: As a Software Engineer and Full Stack Developer, I have successfully taken multiple projects for different technologies (tech stacks). I also lead tech teams effectively ensuring the team growth and coersion. Currently I mostly work with JavaScript & TypeScript, React, NextJS, NestJS, Laravel, MySQL & PostgreSQL and other tools (like Tailwind CSS, React Native). I have over 12 years of experience and I'm passionate about learning new tech stacks and looking for new challenges and innovation projects.

work.name: Ministerio Público Fiscal de la C.A.B.A.
work.summary: I currently serve as the Head of the Computer Research and Development Department (DIyDI) and my main tasks are to manage the projects and resources of the Department, to design software architectures for new projects, legacy systems and integrations with other organizations. Also, I have to manage servers corresponding to the Department, carry out and coordinate production deployments (mainly using CI/CD to this).

work.name: Freelancer
work.position: System's Information Engineer & Fullstack Software Developer
work.summary: I perform computer consulting tasks, software architecture, and fullstack software development. Additionally, DevOps tasks and deployments.

work.name: Ministerio Público Fiscal de la C.A.B.A.
work.summary: My main task was the assembly and management of the development, testing and design team of the 'Área de Gestión de Aplicaciones Informáticas'  belonging to the Ministerio Público Fiscal de la C.A.B.A.

work.name: Ministerio Público Fiscal de la C.A.B.A.
work.summary: Technical analysis tasks, software development (new projects + legacy systems) within the IT and Communications Department belonging to the Ministerio Público Fiscal de la C.A.B.A.

work.name: Baufest
work.summary: I developed and configured SharePoint platform for several clients. I integrated SharePoint solutions with InfoPath forms and the Nintex Workflow tool. I carried out .NET integrations between different platforms (ClearQuest, ActiveDirectory, SharePoint)

work.name: Baufest
work.summary: I carried out the configuration, implementation and development of IBM Rational ClearQuest platform. Interfaces development with VBScript. PL-SQL programming.

work.name: IBM
work.summary: I carried out development and evolutionary maintenance of IBM Lotus Domino applications for HR LATAM.

work.name: NSX S.A.
work.summary: I developed, installed and administered the IBM Lotus Domino platform. Additionally, I provided development and help desk support to multiple clients.

volunteer.summary: I migrated the hosting service and the server. I developed and coordinated the implementation of a new institutional site (development and design) with a custom CMS for content management, integration with Google Calendar and Leaflet GIS.
